titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, Writing on Board HMS Eden, at Sea Off Tahrie, to Major General Sir William Grant Keir

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, informs Sir William Grant Keir of his decision to join HMS Edenon her voyage along the Arab coast in search of Wahabe [Wahhābī] boats. Bruce recounts taking and destroying boats at Rasselkhyma [Ra's al-Khaymah] and Asseloo [Bandar-e ‘Asalūyeh]. Bruce forwards despatches (not included) received from His Royal Highness the Prince at Shurauz [Shiraz] and HM Chargé d’Affaires of the Court of Tahrame [Tehran] respectively.
